description: Read articles by Liron Hakim-Bobrov, Marketing Insights Manager at Similarweb. If you’re interested in data analysis & strategic industry insights - Click here
content: HomeBlogLiron Hakim Bobrov Marketing Insights Manager at Similarweb Liron Hakim Bobrov Liron is a Marketing Insights Manager at Similarweb. A passionate data-driven team member, Liron has been using her expertise to provide clients' industry insights for over 5 years, 3 of which she has spent at Similarweb. She has an MBA from Tel Aviv University. Her specialties include content management, data analysis and uncovering strategic industry insights.
